overview:
Joanne Manley is the Director of Strategic Alliances at Invoke Solutions, Europe.

Joanne has been a key player at Invoke since 2005 as the Director of Marketing and is now based in London, where she will head up the company’s European alliances. Prior to joining Invoke, Joanne held various positions in marketing management and marketing program implementation, including Marketing Manager at Welcom, an enterprise project management software company. She also brings international marketing experience to Invoke with past assignments in the UK, Germany, and Hong Kong. Manley has a Bachelors degree in European Business from the University of East Anglia in the UK, and she recently earned her MBA at Bentley College in Waltham, MA.

Source: Invoke Solutions
